item.description: System Security Revision —— Cryptography Content What is Cryptography? Flow Classical Ciphers What is Cryptography? In ancient Greek, kryptós means hidden or secret and, of course, graphy means to write. Generally, we consider cryptography as a practical study for secure communication, that is for preventing the third parties or the public from reading the private messages[1].
